predicate.note: Frames file for 'outweigh' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to weigh more, be more significant than

example.name: transitive
example.text: In a decision in April of this year , Judge Roger Miner , [*-1] joined [*-2] by Judge Frank Altimari , agreed on [*] denying the injunction and did not doubt that `` Bare-Faced Messiah '' was a serious work but rejected Judge Leval 's argument that the public interest in scholarship could outweigh the sanctity of copyright .
